mapper.insert: INSERT INTO youtube(id, title, thumbnail, published_at, channel_id, description, reg_date) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{thumbnail}, #{publishedAt}, #{channelId}, #{description}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = #{title}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, published_at = #{publishedAt}, channel_id = #{channelId}, description = #{description}, reg_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, thumbnail, published_at, channel_id, description FROM youtube WHERE reg_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY published_at LIMIT 30
